actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a Commission on the Bicentennial of the Louisiana Purchase and the Lewis and Clark Expedition.
short_title: Louisiana Purchase and Lewis and Clark Expedition Bicentennial Commission Act

summary.text: Louisiana Purchase and Lewis and Clark Expedition Bicentennial Commission Act - Establishes the Louisiana Purchase and Lewis and Clark Expedition Bicentennial Commission to encourage, plan, coordinate, and conduct the commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the Louisiana Purchase and the Lewis and Clark Expedition.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Louisiana Purchase and Lewis and Clark Expedition Bicentennial Commission Act
A bill to establish a Commission on the Bicentennial of the Louisiana Purchase and the Lewis and Clark Expedition.
